title: Michigan in the Sweet 16!
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss Michigan showing up big in the opening weekend of the NCAA Tournament. Will Jabari Smith get downgraded in the NBA Draft after Auburn’s early exit? How should Browns fans feel about signing Deshaun Watson? LeBron James is locked in on winning the scoring race this season, and Jalen breaks down why the Warriors won’t win the West this season. All that and much more.
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
